mapper.insert: insert into t_driver_message_command (driver_code, driver_name, driver_account, driver_password, driver_id_card_number, driver_phone, province_code, city_code, area_code, is_deleted, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version) values (#{driverId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{areaId}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select:
select a.driver_code driverId, a.driver_name userName, a.driver_phone phone, a.driver_id_card_number idCard, a.driver_account userAcct, a.version from t_driver_message_command a where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.driver_code like concat('%', #{driverId}, '%')
and a.driver_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.province_code like concat('%', #{provinceId}, '%')
and a.city_code like concat('%', #{cityId}, '%')
and a.area_code like concat('%', #{areaId}, '%')
order by a.create_time desc
